mdRecord.dcterms:title: Richard Dulaney Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On White Rock Road in a field above what was known as the Alpha Duncan home. N 36 57.149 W 80 28.1043. This is 97 acres remaining of original tract; a land grant from the King of England to the Dulaney family.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
